summary: The module supplies reusable test infrastructure for the CKAN datastore extension, offering base classes that set up shared test environments and a collection of utility helpers for managing the test database, running SQL statements, extracting data, configuring URL handling, and tracking analysis timestamps.
business_intent: To streamline and standardize functional testing of the datastore component by providing common setup logic and convenient helper functions that manipulate the test database and environment, thereby reducing duplication and simplifying test development.
